attributes.action: Introduce mandatory regulation for non-medic aesthetic practitioners
attributes.additional_details: We require parliament to assist us in protecting the public. They can achieve this through creating and maintaining a register of aesthetic practitioners, through setting and monitoring standards of education, practice and conduct, and through handling complaints about misconduct and unfitness to practise of those on the register.
attributes.background: To be included in the regulation should be a mandatory register with PIN.  Practitioners must meet minimum training requirements, provide proof of insurance, operate from licensed premises, hold a personal licence and abide by a code of conduct.
